name: Flappy Plane (HandsomeUnicorn)
description:
Hi, I not new to Unity, but I know this game is a little wonky. The main thing I have trouble with is the camera (if you know how to fix it let me know). I want to develop more apps so I can make a living or pay off my student debt. :) 

Just have fun and let me know what you think.

-Don't play in fullscreen mode

The APK ,if you download it has ads, so thanks if you play on Android! <3
